Without Touching It
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_7my32e1ajwc_html: Finally, a Smart Ring That Can Help You During Everything
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_tojmtq5uu5_html: ArcX Smart Ring Control your phone, wireless speaker, sports camera or any Bluetooth device, on the move, hands free, even when wearing gloves.
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_jj1qfkqzb2_html: Why 2,500+ People Use ArcX Every Day
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_7lv4fmsiq1_html:

ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_0u84p1i07ozm_html: Cycling
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_b3d4syoq9xh_html: Running
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_0yae2e156kl_html: Gym
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_kkaschntmve_html: Why 2,500+ People Use ArcX Every Day
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_w26z45r1sg_html:
"I wish I had this when I was training for the Olympics."

- Constantine Louloudis MBE Olympic and double world champion rower
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_1pcynmphmdn_html:
ArcX simplifies your active life. Whether you’re running, cycling or at the gym control your music seamlessly without missing a beat. 
No need to reach for your phone, with ArcX you'll enjoy hands free control.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_i179ca5b37k_html: ArcX works with all major music apps including, but not limited to Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music,  SoundCloud, Deezer, Amazon Music, Tidal and YouTube Music.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_rpgwnlmx7f_html:
The SOS call function can be triggered from any mode by pressing and holding the centre button for ﬁve seconds. 
This  calls the emergency services number in your region and also sends an SMS requesting help along with a Google map link of your current location.
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_14ds8hld916_html: Hear It from Those We've Served
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_xkbyx928djl_html: ArcX simplifies your active life. Whether you’re running, cycling or at the gym control your music seamlessly without missing a beat. No need to reach for your phone, with ArcX you'll enjoy hands free control.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_065i03cbs78q_html: ArcX works with all major music apps including, but not limited to Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music,  SoundCloud, Deezer, Amazon Music, Tidal and YouTube Music.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_duklyfmqf0u_html: The SOS call function can be triggered from any mode by pressing and holding the centre button for ﬁve seconds. This  calls the emergency services number in your region and also sends an SMS requesting help along with a Google map link of your current location.
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_46zrn74afuc_html: The Best Upgrade of Your Fitness Life. Guaranteed.
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_6zfg9itvte8_html: The Best Upgrade of Your Fitness Life. Guaranteed.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_chayfm8vyj_html: If for any reason, you don't get a better training with ArcX Ring, return it within 30 days for a full-refund. No questions asked.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_9h1oufry88k_html:
If for any reason, you don't get a better training with ArcX Ring, return it within 30 days for a full-refund.
No questions asked.
ecom-preview-page-page.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomuevnqicoigi_uevnqi: Get free standard shipping when you spend $50
ecom-preview-page-page.headingtext_xjfvuhs9oid_html: The ArcX Story
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_gwgx3mceqot_html: On a skiing trip a few years ago a friend injured himself so Paul, our CEO, spent the rest of the trip skiing alone listening to music. When he wanted to change his playlist, adjust the volume or accept a phone call Paul had to stop, take a glove off and retrieve his phone from a pocket, before replacing everything to carry on. He had a similar experience running, cycling and training in his local gym. There was no existing wearable device or phone accessory that solved this problem, until now.
ecom-preview-page-page.textcontent_567w3dhikr3_html: On a skiing trip a few years ago a friend injured himself so Paul, our CEO, spent the rest of the trip skiing alone listening to music. When he wanted to change his playlist, adjust the volume or accept a phone call Paul had to stop, take a glove off and retrieve his phone from a pocket, before replacing everything to carry on. He had a similar experience running, cycling and training in his local gym. There was no existing wearable device or phone accessory that solved this problem, until now.
